thread.title: Breitbart's Milo Yiannopoulos resigns following outrage over his past comments about pedophilia
thread.title_full: Breitbart's Milo Yiannopoulos resigns following outrage over his past comments about pedophilia

author: The Washington Post
title: Breitbart's Milo Yiannopoulos resigns following outrage over his past comments about pedophilia
text: Yiannopoulos -- known simply as MILO in Breitbart's own coverage of him -- has been a flame-throwing provocateur whose writing has offended women, Muslims, blacks and gay people ever since former Breitbart executive chairman Stephen K. Bannon hired him as a senior editor in 2014.
